item.title: 0017 Expose OAuth Endpoints
item.description: Zapier Zapier gives me a list of things that I will need to configure for the zapier app to be able to communicate with my app vi OAuth. I think this is a good way to call out the routes I need to build. Authentication Type OAuth V2 w/refresh Client ID AKA “Consumer Key” or “API Key” zapier Client Secret AKA “Consumer Secret” or “API Secret” asdjhalsgdhgaposdigu (some string) Authorization URL For now I will list what I see the consent app presenting.
